meanings.definition: A person who engages in orgies.
meanings.sent1: The orgiasts gathered for a wild party last night.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the orgiasts at the underground club.
meanings.sent3: The orgiasts accidentally crashed a birthday party instead of their own.
meanings.sent4: The rumors about the orgiasts spread like wildfire in the small town.
meanings.sent5: The image of the orgiasts dancing under the moonlight was unforgettable.
